nodes.text: Second battle of Iridonia  (Jedi Civil War)

The second battle at the planet Iridonia was an event during the Jedi Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and Darth Revan's Sith Empire. At Iridonia, the two sides fought with the Republic emerging as the victors.

The Second Battle of Iridonia makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. An exact date is not provided for the battle, and it only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose. The other battle at Iridonia is also illustrated on the map, marking a Sith victory which appears in the Wizards of the Coast supplement Iridonian Darkness. This battle, however, is placed at the front-end of the war, sometime in 3958 BBY, following the bombing of Telos IV. The second battle takes place at a time which has not been canonically solidified.
